body.name: Air Fryer Oven 20 Quart Large, 10-in-1 Airfryer Rotisserie Dehydrator Toaster Oven Combo with Racks, XL Digital Countertop Air Fryer for Family, 9 Accessories with Cookbook, ETL Certified
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 23 mins
features: ★【10-in-1 Versatility】With 10 preset programs, the HotKing air fryer oven combo can fry, bake, roast, dehydrate, reheat, rotisserie, and toast. A full set of attachments allows for easy cooking of various foods, such as whole chicken, fries, steak, frozen pizza, kebab, and dried fruit. Get this "kitchen beast" and maximize countertop space by eliminating multiple appliances.

★【Perfect for Large Families】Cook for the whole family with ease thanks to the 20 QT xl capacity and 1800 watt working power, allowing for faster cooking and more food at once. Prepare up to 7-9 servings, including a 5lb chicken, 10-inch pizza, and up to 3 layers of food. This powerful air fryer is ideal for family and holiday gatherings.

★【Crispy Crunch, Juicy Taste】The large fan and top heating element work together to circulate hot air from the top down, resulting in faster crisping while maintaining a moist inside. Enjoy all the crunch and tenderness of deep-frying with 85% less oil. Say goodbye to worries over extra fat in food.

★【One-Touch Smart Control】The digital air fryer includes 10 preset cooking programs to simplify cooking. Just hit the button and walk away! The auto power off system frees up your focus during cooking. Detailed user guide and cookbook included, making it easy for beginners to start cooking right away.

★【Easy to Clean Accessories】Durable stainless steel attachments are dishwasher safe, making them easy to clean. Try this airfryer risk-free with the extended one-year warranty, without any concerns about issues with quality.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large, Compact and Versatile Air Fryer Oven; Cooks Almost All of Your Family Meals with Ease Boasting a 20-quart xl capacity, this air fryer is perfect for making large batches of your favorite fried foods. Our preset digital touch panel allows you to air fry, bake, roast, toast, dehydrate, and rotisserie, just to name a few. The given features of this air fryer make it the perfect gift choice for upgrading kitchen appliances: 10 versatile cooking options 9 extra dishwasher safe attachments 20 quart large capacity to serve big family Cook healthier food with less oil Perfect size for countertop
All-in-1 Machine, Save Space and Save Money

Easy to Use, Easy to Clean Responsive touch panel with ergonomic angle It is very convenient for you to choose the preset button and adjust the cooking time and temperature. Cookbook Included for Beginners We provide 50+ recipes with detailed time and temp instructions. Even beginners can make various dishes using this air fryer oven. Dishwasher Safe Accessories Don't worry about clAeaning up, all of its accessories are dishwasher safe. If hand washing is preferred, simply soak and then clean with a sponge.

Safety Assured by Carefully Designed Components Large handle on the door make sure you don't burn yourself while opening the air fryer. It is easy to take food in and out with the big open door. The suction cup on the bottom helps to secure the machine to your countertop, so there's no need to worry about it moving while it's in use.

You Get All the Accessories Needed The toaster oven air fryer combo comes with a 1 x chicken fork, 1 x rotisserie skewers, 3 x dehydrating basket, 1 x mesh basket, 1 x drip tray, 1 x fetch rack, satisfies your daily cooking needs.

FAQs about the air fryers: 1. Why does it smell when I first use it? A slight smell may occur during the first use due to the coatings on machine components to against corrosion, but this is a normal phenomenon that can be resolved by baking the empty machine for 10 minutes without any food. 2. Cannot find the toaster button? The toaster function is not preset but you can easily set the time and temp for the toaster. 3. The rod cannot rotate? Take the rod out and check the two ends, make sure they are properly installed. Not to overload food on the rod, best below 5 lb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and super versatile. I love all the rotisserie features.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I LOVE this thing! It’s really easy to use and super versatile! I was using it about 2 hours after I unpacked it - including running to get groceries! You push the power button in the center of the screen, and then choose one of 10 presets like fries, steaks, or baking OR you can control it yourself by selecting a temperature and time. Then you hit the power button again and it starts. Add two minutes to whatever time you want to allow for preheating. Stick your food in when the two minutes have passed. Hit the rotating button if you are using the rotating basket, rotisserie, or kebab wheel. That’s it.It comes with:3 dehydrating trays for dehydrating, or just air frying in a single layer.1 air frying basket for anything that doesn’t need to be in a single layer. Be sure to shake at halftime.1 rotisserie accessory (2 forks that connect to the long bar) for rotisserie chicken1 rotisserie basket (uses same long bar) anything that doesn’t have a coating and is in small pieces. Cooks so evenly!1 rotisserie wheel (uses same long bar) with 8 kebabs for making kebabs.1 liner tray to line the bottom of the air fryer and catch any drips.What we made so far:Sweet potato hash for breakfast. I used the rotisserie basket and nearly filled it with sweet potatoes tossed in olive oil, onion powder, shallot powder, and seasoned pepper. They shrunk by about half and they were perfect – crispy exterior and pillowy interior.Pork tenderloin rubbed in olive oil, smoky paprika, garlic, onion, and mustard with garlicky brussels sprouts. These went in together. I had the pork on a dehydrator tray and the sprouts below in the air frying basket. Terrific all in one dinner.Chicken fingers coated in egg and then dipped in almond flour, cassava flour, and tapioca flour with a little chopped bacon and cheesy almond crackers. And garlic rosemary fries. These were awesome. I did the chicken fingers on the dehydrator trays. When I do chicken tenders, I pull that little tendon out and sometimes a little piece breaks off. The little pieces were way crispier, so next time, I’ll cut the chicken fingers into 4. Not to get nerdy, but this thing loves surface area. The smaller the crispier! I did the fries in the rotisserie basket. My potatoes were big. If I’m using potatoes that big again, I’ll halve them.Tropi-bobs! Chicken, onion, sweet pepper, and pineapple kebabs brushed with sesame oil, salt, pepper, garlic, and ginger, and air fried on the rotisserie kebab wheel then brushed with a little soy sauce. Heavenly!For anything involving the rotisserie, I put them in with my hands so I could line up the square end of the rotisserie bar with the square receptacle on the left-side air-fryer wall. Then I used the football goalpost (I might be making up names for the tools) to remove the hot food and equipment from the air fryer. Totally recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually an air fryer not just an oven.
reviews.reviewText: Like this one so much better than my bravo xl one. Hopefully this one will last longer than a year. I was in the market looking for an air fryer since my other one happen to quit working all of a sudden. I needed something that had a bigger capacity close to my old one and a see through window. I was either going to to the kaloric one which had a gigantic size or the wowchef. What won me over was the rotisserie function. And I'm glad I got the wowchef. This thing crisp up food faster and more crispy than my less than 1 year old air fryer oven. It has preset buttons for different food items and you can change the time and temperature. It has a light which is awesome. It also comes with kabob attachments three thin and one big air fry baskets. And a flat tray. First thing I made was fries and let me tell you they came out great. This thing cooks it fast so be careful and go make sure you check on your food cuz it cooks it fast. May need to lower the cook time. Even though the temperature only goes go 400 degrees it is enough. It has a top burner element and a large fan. It doesn't have a toast option but what you need to do is hit the fry button and set the time for 5 to 6 minutes depending on thickness of bread and how toasty you like it. Probably want to flip it over at halfway mark. I've cooked tots, pizza bites, chicken tenders, pizza, cakes and cookie with is machine. Fyi dont just throw frozen Cookie onto the air fryer tray it will fall thru the wire while cooking learned that the hard way. Gotta use the bottom drip tray and line it with parchment paper. For cakes and brownies gotta cook it less than and set it close to bottom. Top will burn if you use the cook time on the box. Only thing negative about this machine is the crumbs catching on the front window. Kinda hard to clean plus it falls through the cracks and ends up on the counter. Also what's cool about this it has suction cups to hold the unit from moving. And for safety it has a thicker wire compared to my bravo xl where the thin cord on the bravo would get hot to the touch. But not with wowchef. Overall very satisfied with this airfryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Best air fryer I've purchased so far. I use it all the time and it cooks more than one thing at a time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this machine! Air frying itself, not so much. Dehydrating - definitely!
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a great cook, tho I can usually manage my way thru a recipe, so I decided to show a photo of the air fryer in dehydrator use. As a widow living alone, too often some of my vegetables go bad before I can use them. THIS wonderful machine with its terrific dehydrator function will put an end to that! Now I can have certain veggies dehydrated for use in cooking and won't need to always have fresh on hand - celery, bell peppers, mushrooms (shown), onions !!! - and other goodies. It's important to dehydrate fruit and vegetables at lower temperatures to preserve the enzymes. THIS wonderful machine does that - starts at 90 degrees F.As for all the other fab functions, many of which I haven't even tried yet, I love how the machine operates. It's so easy to navigate, so intuitive. It doesn't heat up externally at all (well, okay, SOME), the oven light is great, and it's nearly silent.Now I just have to learn better work habits on my part. My instant pot spoiled me in terms of containing the mess, so I have been a little all-thumbs with this new purchase and making more mess than I like. So I'm trying to establish routines and procedures to minimize cleanup while efficiently managing the trays, etc. I need something to put the trays on when I take them out of the machine, for example. But I'll get to where I need to be: the simply divine chicken thighs I cooked demand it!I'm really pleased with this purchase and recommend it highly.

I bought this air fryer in may 2022, now it's been 6 months and the air just stopped circulating for no apparent reason. Worked yesterday and today I turned it on and it's not moving the air. Sadly it's garbage after 6 months. It was great while it worked, and if you don't mind throwing your money for the item that will last 6 months go ahead and buy it, otherwise, my suggestion, don't waste your money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not cook frozen pizza, very disappointed.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mainly for French fires and frozen pizza. After a couple of trial and errors the French fries were perfectly cooked. Wish it was the same for frozen pizza. I've tried 3 different ways to cook frozen pizza and all three times it NEVER cooked the bottom crust but burned the top, the pepperoni came out as crispy as bacon and the cheese was burnt. I'm thinking of buying a pizza stone but that adds to the price of the air fryer. I am giving it a three stars because of the French fries, but it is a one star for the pizza. I do not recommend this product.
